Scotch.
I like my whiskey American. Just like my cheese.
translation.ko: 난 아메리칸 위스키가 좋더라 치즈도 그래

translation.en: In all my world travels, I've had Swiss cheese, French Brie cheese,
translation.ko: 외국 나가서 스위스 치즈, 프랑스 브리 치즈

translation.en: every kind of cheese you can name.
And I like processed American slices the best.
Kraft cheese melts the best. That's why I like it.
translation.ko: 크래프트 치즈가 제일 잘 녹아서 좋아

translation.en: I'm just not one who thinks it's better 'cause it's foreign.
translation.ko: 외국 거라고 다 좋은 게 아니야

translation.en: -Could I have some more? -Look out.
Jaden got himself a taste for the whiskey.
Just a little bit, though. Just a little.
-You, too, Don? -Whoo-hoo!
[Don] He ain't gonna outdrink me.
All right. Here we go. One, two, three.
[singing] ♪ Emancipate yourself From mental slavery ♪
Okay.
Damn. That was awesome. That was beautiful.
What'd you think?
It's good. I had trouble following the story of the song,
translation.ko: 좋네, 가사는 잘 이해 안 됐지만

translation.en: but it was good. It was good. [chuckles]
-How long you been playing for? -Two years.
Two years. Wow, I had no idea.
-[cell phone ringing] -Ah, hold up.
-It's Caroline. Dang. Hold on. -[Don chuckles]
-[Buck] Everything all right? -It's fine.
[Buck] Tell me about this girl you're dating.
-You go to the same school? -No. She's already in middle school.
translation.ko: - 학교 친구야? - 아니, 걔는 중학교 다녀

translation.en: Oh, middle school. Uh-oh, look out. Jaden's got himself an older woman.
No. Jaden got held back a year.
It's nothing to be ashamed of, right, son? It's all good.
translation.ko: 창피한 일 아닌 거 알지? 괜찮아

translation.en: Did I tell you I got a girlfriend?
Yes, I do. Her name's Kimberly.
I got a photograph of her here.
There she is. Ninety-eight pounds.
I call her my little spinner. Wanna know why?
Why?
Because I set her up on the tip of my pecker
and spin her around like a spinning top.
All right, Don. That's enough. [laughing]
Oh, God, love her. [laughs]
After this trip, me and her are gonna visit her folks in Kentucky. Phew.
translation.ko: 여행 끝나면 켄터키에 있는 킴벌리 가족한테 인사도 가

translation.en: They got it figured out. They got this beautiful land.
translation.ko: 식구들이 인생을 살 줄 알아 멋진 땅에

translation.en: Great big farm. All they do is sit around watching TV. [scoffs]
translation.ko: 큰 농장이 있는데 종일 TV나 실컷 보거든

translation.en: Don't they have a farm to run?
I guess. I ain't never seen them do it, though.
translation.ko: 짓겠지, 근데 한 번도 못 봤어

translation.en: All I see them do is watch television.
That is gangster.
Sounds kind of boring to me.
[chuckling] Me and Kimberly like it, so it's not that boring to me.
How about you, Dad? You got a girlfriend?
Who, Buck? The only tail your dad is chasing is whitetail.
[Buck chuckles] Yeah. That's right.
Maybe you should start dating again.
No, no, no. I'm all right as is. I'm doing just fine.
translation.ko: 아빠는 이대로가 좋아 잘 살고 있어

translation.en: Probably be good for you.
Seems like Mom is moving on. Her and Greg are talking about getting married.
translation.ko: 엄마는 새 출발 하려나 보던데 그레그 아저씨랑 결혼 얘기 해

translation.en: They're talking about what?
He hasn't officially asked her yet, but she knows it's coming.
translation.ko: 아직 정식 청혼은 안 했지만 엄마도 결혼할 눈치야

translation.en: They talk about it all the time.
Shoot. That's ridiculous.
The ink on the divorce is barely even dry.
translation.ko: 이혼 서류 잉크도 아직 안 말랐는데

translation.en: [chuckles] It has been two years, Buck.
What are you, a human calendar?
Mr. Trapper Keeper? I know how long it's been.
translation.ko: 기념일 계산기야? 이혼 날짜는 나도 알아

translation.en: God! Shoot. I hate selfish people!
[Jaden] I'll give it to him, though.
Greg told me some of his ideas for when he proposes.
Man, that dude has a great imagination.
He was talking about all these crazy things like skydiving.
Where you going?
I'm gonna go take a leak.
Dang.
What were you thinking?
You know better than to pull a stunt like this.
You could have hurt yourself.
Sorry. Dang!
What is going on in your mind?
I just wanted to ride and y'all were asleep.
translation.ko: 저게 타고 싶었는데 아빠랑 삼촌이 자고 있었잖아

translation.en: You realize I have to pay for that four-wheeler now?
-You realize how much they cost? -[sighs]
[Buck] Why are you recording?
This isn't part of the narrative.
I figured it might make a good mid-point crisis--
translation.ko: 중반에 위기를 넣으면 그림이 괜찮을까 해서...

translation.en: Shut the camera off.
Trying to have a moment with my son. Remove yourself.
translation.ko: 아들이랑 얘기 좀 하겠다고 자리 좀 비켜

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
[sighs] This sucks. If you let me drive, then we wouldn't be in this predicament.
translation.ko: 짜증 나, 애초에 타게 해줬으면 이 지경까진 안 왔잖아

translation.en: You shouldn't have taken out the four-wheeler without permission.
translation.ko: 아니, 허락도 안 받고 운전한 네 잘못이지

translation.en: Fine. I'm the devil. I'm a terrible person.
translation.ko: 그래, 내 잘못이지 내가 나쁜 놈이야

translation.en: -Who are you calling? -Nobody.
Dang, I'm making a video for my vlog.
What's up? This is Jaden running around here,
hunting in the woods with my dad.
Sucks.
Leave me some comments if you hate hunting, too.
Give it.
What are you doing?
I told you one too many times to stay off the phone.
translation.ko: 휴대폰 그만 만지라고 몇 번을 얘기했어?

translation.en: But that's my private property.
I'm keeping this until the end of the trip.
For the next few days, you have to go without it.
What about Caroline?
The world isn't gonna end if you can't call your girlfriend for three days.
translation.ko: 여친이랑 사흘 통화 못 한다고 세상 안 무너져

translation.en: But we're each other's support system.
The cell phone is mine. Topic closed.
You're ruining my life and you don't even care.
Maybe I'm ruining your life 'cause you're being a damn idiot.
translation.ko: 네가 등신처럼 구니까 아빠가 인생을 망치지

translation.en: Don't call me an idiot!
-Okay. -Take it back.
I take it back. It's not like I meant it.
Let's forget about it.
Now what about that non-typical we saw yesterday?
How'd you like to bag that son of a gun, huh?
Come on, we're hunting. Let's have fun.
I can't stand you sometimes.
[Buck] I see you peeking out from behind that tree.
translation.ko: 거기 숨어서 몰래 찍는 거 다 보여

translation.en: This is not going in the cut.
After experiencing some technical difficulties
translation.ko: 저희가 몰던 사륜 오토바이 한 대에

translation.en: with one of our four-wheelers,
we decided to go on foot.
Nothing was gonna keep Jaden and me from catching that monster non-typical.
translation.ko: 저희 부자의 별종 사냥은 그 무엇도 못 막습니다

translation.en: When things don't go right, a true hunter straps on his boots and marches on.
translation.ko: 상황이 열악해도 진정한 사냥꾼은 신발 끈을 꽉 묶고 쭉 걸어가죠

translation.en: Just when we thought we'd lost the trail,
I noticed a whole mess of tracks by the river.
This was a good sign.
It looked like a well-traveled doe trail, and like every hunter knows,
translation.ko: 자주 쓰이는 암컷 동선 같았어요 사냥꾼이라면 알다시피

translation.en: where there's a doe, a buck is not far behind.
translation.ko: 암컷이 있는 곳엔 수컷도 가까이 있기 마련이죠

translation.en: I showed Jaden how the doe trail followed up the river.
translation.ko: 저는 제이든에게 강 위로 향하는 암컷 동선을 보여줬습니다

translation.en: Our non-typical was leading us even deeper into the mountains,
translation.ko: 별종이 저희를 산 깊숙이 이끄는 것 같네요

translation.en: miles away from human contact.
Almost as if it was calling us.
translation.ko: 그놈이 꼭 저희를 부르는 것 같았어요

translation.en: Just like life, hunting comes with no guarantees.
But I don't usually have a problem finding the big deer,
translation.ko: 전 큰 사슴도 어렵지 않게 찾을 수 있죠

translation.en: especially with that old Sniper 2000 stuff I use.
That's what I'm talking about.
It's like he doesn't even care about catching this deer.
This trip was supposed to be a way for us to bond.
Yeah, well, it doesn't look like that's happening.
-Jesus, Don. -What? I'm agreeing with you.
It doesn't look like it's happening.
-Yeah, well, stop. -Okay. Copy that.
I was hoping to discuss something with you, if you don't mind.
translation.ko: 같이 상의하고 싶은 게 있는데 너만 괜찮다면

translation.en: Yeah, what?
Well, I was thinking maybe after this trip I go ahead and take a little time off.
translation.ko: 이번 출장 끝나고 난 좀 쉴까 해서

translation.en: What? Time off?
Yeah, you know, I told you about Kimberly's parents' farm.
translation.ko: 전에 킴벌리 부모님 농장 얘기 했잖아

translation.en: We were thinking maybe going up there,
spend a little time, uh, hang out there. See how it fits us.
translation.ko: 여유롭게 쉬면서 농장 체질인가 볼까 해

translation.en: But we got Washington next month.
That's the thing. I was thinking maybe you go up alone and I sit this one out.
translation.ko: 그래서 말인데, 나 빼고 너 혼자 가는 건 어떨까

translation.en: But we gotta shoot Buck Ferguson Takes On the Great Northwest.
Well, Buck, to be honest,
Kimberly's getting sick of me leaving all the time.
translation.ko: 킴벌리가 나 출장 다니는 거 지겹대

translation.en: She's throwing around the "R" word.
What's that word?
Retirement. She thinks I should be retiring.
I can't believe you're choosing now to bring this up.
Don't you think I got enough to worry about with Jaden?
translation.ko: 제이든 걱정으로도 벅찬 거 안 보여?

translation.en: Yeah, of course I do. [chuckles]
Look, you and me have done things the world is gonna remember.
translation.ko: 우린 전 세계가 기억할 업적을 세웠어

translation.en: I've done them, but you videotaped me doing them.
translation.ko: 물론 내가 했지만 그걸 찍은 건 너잖아

translation.en: You wanna throw that all away?
No, Buck. I never said I want to throw them away. I...
This isn't really that thought out of an idea.
It was just something she was pushing on me.
I'm sorry, but I can't allow it.
Your dream of watching TV all day long is gonna have to wait.
translation.ko: 온종일 TV나 보는 꿈은 미뤄야 할 거야

translation.en: I need all hands on deck right now.
Yeah. No. Of course you do.
We're in the middle of it, so, yeah.
Maybe we can agree to discuss this at a later date.
translation.ko: 그럼 이 문제는 나중에 다시 상의하든지

translation.en: -How about that? -Yeah. I don't know, Don.
Maybe in a year or so. But probably not.
translation.ko: 1년 뒤에 할 수도 있고 영영 안 할걸

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds good. Just forget I even said anything about it.
translation.ko: 괜찮네 내가 한 얘긴 없던 걸로 해

translation.en: [Don] Hey, look what I found.
Keep moving.
Be careful. You're gonna hurt yourself.
I'm not. I'm trained for this. Greg set me up with parkour lessons.
translation.ko: 훈련해서 괜찮아 그레그가 파쿠르 레슨 시켜줬거든

translation.en: I thought you were taking karate. We agreed on karate.
translation.ko: 가라테 배우는 거 아니었어? 아빠랑 합의 봤잖아

translation.en: It was too hard, so I quit.
Well, it takes time to learn something, son.
You can't just go around quitting stuff 'cause it's hard.
translation.ko: 어렵다고 바로 그만두고 그러면 안 돼

translation.en: [Jaden] That's not what Greg says.
Greg says if you don't like doing something,
there ain't no reason to do it. And it's totally cool to quit.
translation.ko: 억지로 할 필요 없댔어 그만둬도 괜찮다고

translation.en: Well, that's a terrible lesson. No wonder you got held back.
Greg says it was the teacher's fault.
Greg's only telling you what you wanna hear
translation.ko: 네가 듣고 싶은 말만 해주는 거야

translation.en: because he wants to suck up and not hurt your feelings.
translation.ko: 너한테 잘 보이느라 상처 주기 싫은 거지

translation.en: Trust me when I tell you that when you get a little older,
translation.ko: 아빠 말 들어 나이 먹기 시작하면

translation.en: you won't think gymnastics are cool anymore.
I told you, it's not gymnastics, it's parkour--
Oh, you're okay.
No, I'm not. My leg's getting ready to seize up on me.
That's why I told you stop playing around on the rocks. Get up.
Let me catch my breath for a second.
-Is your leg hurting or are you tired? -Both. Dang.
translation.ko: - 다리 아픈 거야, 피곤한 거야? - 둘 다지!

translation.en: Okay, we lost the whole morning already.
-Daylight's burning here. -But, Dad, my leg's fixing to die.
translation.ko: - 곧 해 지게 생겼어 - 내 다리가 아파 죽겠다고

translation.en: [Don] Oh, you shit bird!
[Buck] You all right, Don?
[sighs] I slipped on this damn rock and hit my darn head.
Maybe it is a good time to stop for lunch.
Yeah, let's make camp. Sounds like a good idea.
Good, 'cause my blood sugar's running low.
Oh, shit, am I bleeding?
Hey, Jaden, where's your daddy?
-Making sandwiches. -You ain't hungry?
I am hungry. But I'm gonna put my hunger pangs into my music.
Oh, uh-oh. What's wrong?
I could tell you, but you would never understand.
Oh, you might be surprised what old Don understands.
translation.ko: 돈 아저씨가 이해하는 걸 알면 깜짝 놀랄걸

translation.en: -[lighter clicks] -You smoke?
Hell, yeah, I do. Don't tell your dad, though.
Thinks it scares away the deer.
translation.ko: 담배 연기가 사슴을 쫓는 줄 알거든

translation.en: Can I get a toke?
There you go, Biggin.
I wish my dad was more chill like you.
Your dad is definitely not the easiest fella to get along with.
translation.ko: 너희 아빠가 어울리기 편한 사람은 아니지

translation.en: He does put a lot of pressure on himself.
I think that's his drive to become the world's best hunter.
translation.ko: 그 덕에 세계 최고의 사냥꾼이 됐고

translation.en: I can remember the first video I made with your dad.
translation.ko: 아빠랑 첫 촬영 할 때 생각난다

translation.en: We were up in Michigan, and I was not prepared for the weather.
That first day it had snowed ten inches and I'd forgotten my waterproof boots.
translation.ko: 첫날 눈이 25cm나 왔는데 방수 부츠를 깜빡했지

translation.en: I turned to your dad and said,
"Please, Buck, let's turn back. Let's go home. Let's get out of here."
But he wasn't hearing it.
He sat me down. He was like,
"Don, do you know what kind of pressure I'm under? Do you?
translation.ko: '돈, 내 부담이 얼마나 큰지 알아? 아냐고'

translation.en: Every single person thinks
that Buck Ferguson gets his deer every single time,
translation.ko: '벅 퍼거슨이 매 순간 사슴을 잡을 거라고'

translation.en: and I won't turn back until I do."
-What'd you do? -What do you think I did?
Sucked it up.
We stayed out there for another three days and damn if your dad wasn't right.
translation.ko: 사흘을 더 죽쳤는데 하필 네 아빠 말이 맞은 거야

translation.en: He caught himself a nice 12 pointer,
and we made one of the best videos we've ever made.
What about your feet?
I lost my big toe to frostbite.
You lost a toe?
Yes, I did. Yep.
Got a little bit of a balance issue because of it.
translation.ko: 그래서 걸을 때 균형이 좀 안 맞아

translation.en: That's not really the takeaway.
The point of the story is your dad is under a lot of pressure.
translation.ko: 요지는 네 아빠가 느끼는 중압감이 무지 크다는 거지

translation.en: You can understand being under pressure, right?
I guess.
Don, why does my dad hate me?
Hate you?
Oh, come on. You don't believe that.
Your dad is tough to get along with, but he loves you.
translation.ko: 네 아빠가 까칠하긴 해도 너를 사랑하셔

translation.en: These last two years have just been tough on him.
That divorce did a real number on his head.
translation.ko: 이혼 때문에 골치가 심하게 아팠을 거야

translation.en: I think he believes this trip is gonna somehow fix it.
translation.ko: 이번 여행으로 그나마 나아질 거라 믿을걸

translation.en: Well, I wish he'd care less about me killing a deer
and more about giving me back my dang phone.
Caroline's probably worried sick.
I can relate to that.
If I don't call Kimberly every now and then,
she definitely puts my ass in the damn doghouse. [chuckles]
I wish there was some way I could let her know I'm okay.
translation.ko: 난 무사하다는 걸 어떻게든 알려주고 싶은데

translation.en: That's all I want for her right now.
-You ready, buddy? -[Jaden] I'm ready.
-Are you filming? Is it rolling? -Yeah.
Here we go. Hoverboard city.
-[Jaden] Don't be scared. -I ain't scared.
Just don't wanna break my neck. Thanks for the ride, buddy!
translation.ko: 목만 안 부러졌으면 좋겠네 태워줘서 고마워, 친구!

translation.en: Hey, Buck, what you doing? What you up to?
translation.ko: 벅, 뭐 해? 뭐 하고 있어?

translation.en: Just looking for the shortest course to the top of this mountain.
translation.ko: 산 정상까지 가는 최단 경로 찾아봤어

translation.en: Oh, that's great.
Lunch is gonna get cold. Where's Jaden?
Don, look at me. Where's my son?
translation.ko: 돈, 내 눈 봐 아들 어디 있냐고

translation.en: [clears throat] He's, uh, talking with his girlfriend.
No, he's not. I took his phone away.
I let him borrow mine. So he's...
-You did what? -I let him borrow my phone.
It was the right thing to do. He really wanted to speak with her.
translation.ko: 그게 옳은 일이었어 여친이랑 통화하고 싶다잖아

translation.en: I took that away from him so he'd focus on this trip.
How could you do that?
I guess I'm just a believer in true love.
He is really torn up about this girl and I didn't think it was right--
Don! Stop it! I'm his father.
I know what's best for him, and I'd take it kindly
translation.ko: 쟤한테 최선은 내가 알아 그리고 앞으로는

translation.en: if you would not undercut my authority again.
Copy that.
Nothing is going the way it's supposed to.
I cooked this nice meal.
The whole thing's gonna go to waste, just like this trip.
And now, I get to go be the bad guy again.
translation.ko: 난 또 나쁜 놈 되게 생겼어

translation.en: Thanks a lot, Don.
Jaden!
Jaden!
What did I tell you, son?
No phone calls until after this trip and you disobeyed me.
translation.ko: 여행 끝날 때까지 통화 금지랬잖아, 근데 어겨?

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
What do you have to say for yourself?
Caroline broke up with me.
What happened?
She went to this middle school dance,
which everyone knows is a recipe for disaster.
Now she says she doesn't want to date someone in elementary school.
That's ridiculous. You two are the same age.
That's what I told her.
Well, are you doing okay?
I'm fine. She's the one being stupid.
She's being so dumb right now I can barely stand it.
translation.ko: 걔가 너무 멍청해서 참을 수가 없어

translation.en: I hate being in elementary school.
Look, Jaden...
I know you like this girl, but let me tell you something.
translation.ko: 캐럴라인 좋은 건 알겠는데 아빠가 하나 얘기해줄게

translation.en: There is nothing wrong with you.
If Caroline or whatever her name is
can't appreciate you for who you are, then she does not deserve you.
translation.ko: 널 그대로 못 받아들이면 널 만날 자격도 없어

translation.en: Is that why you and Mom got a divorce?
Yeah. There were some other things.
It started in '09.
DVD sales were down slightly.
Your mom was proving through this whole thing
to be a terribly selfish woman.
She just had to give up her lavish lifestyle,
trips to the mall, that sort of thing, and then she just went crazy.
translation.ko: 쇼핑 같은 걸 못 다니니까 돌아버렸지

translation.en: Just started acting out.
Around that time, Greg just kind of weaseled his way in
translation.ko: 그 틈을 노리고 그레그가 족제비같이 끼어들어서

translation.en: and basically stole my family out from me.
It's funny hearing both sides.
Why? How do you mean?
Mom said that you were always out hunting.
And when you weren't hunting, you'd sit around drinking.
translation.ko: 사냥 안 나가면 앉아서 술만 퍼마시고

translation.en: Kinda checked out, like.

Sit here all alone in the woods, totally bored?
No, sir. I want you to take this four-wheeler,
drive Don to Cherokee Mountain Outfitters and get him an ambulance,
